description.value:
Your lethal unarmed attacks leave bloody gouges or cause severe internal bleeding. When you critically hit with a Strike using an unarmed attack that isn't nonlethal, the target takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.

This can be because you're taking the penalty to use a fist for a lethal attack or because you have an unarmed attack without the nonlethal trait due to @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Iron Fists]{Iron Fists}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tusks (Orc)]{Tusks}, or a similar ability.

rules.text: {item|name} When you critically hit with a Strike using an unarmed attack that isn't nonlethal, the target takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,bleed] # Bloody Blows]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.
